1145:1: kaumārye paṭhyatāṃ vidyā śaitye saṃpālyatāṃ ca gauḥ |
1145:2: kṣettraṃ ca karṣyatāṃ pītaṃ trayaḥ sufalahetavaḥ ||1||
1145:3: gate'pi vayasi grāhyā vidyā sarvātmanā budhaiḥ |
1145:7: guṇini guṇajño ramate nāguṇaśīlasya guṇini paritoṣaḥ |
1145:12: guṇāḥ kurvanti dūtatvaṃ dūre'pi basatāṃ satām |
1145:14: vidvatvaṃ ca nṛpatvaṃ ca naiva tulyaṃ kadācana |
1145:15: svadeśe pūjyate rājā vidvān sarvatra pūjyate ||8||
1145:21: vicchedānna hi cāntaraṃ kimapi tat tyājyaṃ na kiṃ tatsthalam |
1145:22: vaivaśyādhdi viyogato manasi jāyante vidhātā ati
1145:23: tatsthānaṃ yadi hīyate sahajataḥ syāccātiśāntiḥ sukham ||10||
1145:26: prapañcā yatnaoto heyāḥ saṃsargaḥ kriyatāṃ satām |
1145:34: yadudeti vinā sūrya tejasvi tanna jāyate |
1145:37: mūdhni vā sarvalokasya śīryate vana eva vā ||16|
1145:38: vāṇi kaṭhorā bhaṇitā hi duṣṭairyā sarparupā sujanān hinasti |
1145:39: te bheṣajaṃ kṣāntimayaṃ ca prajñāṃ saṃsevya cintārahitā bhavanti ||17||
1145:41: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodeti punaḥ śaśī ||18||
1145:44: vanāni dahato vahneḥ sakhā bhavati mārutaḥ |
1145:45: sa eva dīpanāśāya kṛśe kasyāsti sauhṛdam ||20||
1145:50: dūrastho'pi samīpastho yo yasya manasi sthitaḥ|
1145:52: pareṣāṃ vaibhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā mano yasya prakupyati |
1145:53: na tasyārthopalabdhistu citaṃ puṇyaṃ ca naśyati ||24||
1145:54: rāgopamaṃ nāsti malaṃ hi loke īrṣyopamā nāsti ca kā'pi hāniḥ |
1145:55: yāñcāsamo nāsti ca ko'pi bandhurdānopamo nāsti ca mitravargaḥ ||25||
1145:56: kṣudhāsamā nāsti śarīravedanā cintāsamā nāsti śarīraśoṣaṇā |
1145:57: guṇaiḥ samā nāsti śarīrabhūṣaṇā kṣāntyā samaṃ nāsti śarīravarmaṃ vai ||26||
1145:58: dhanena kiṃ kṣudrajanasya mitraiḥ kiṃ vañcakasyāpi ca matsarasya |
1145:59: kiṃ hānidasyātiguṇagrahaiśca kiṃ vā vipattau vimukhātmajena ||27||
1145:60: sarvathā svahitamācaraṇīyaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati jano bahujalpaḥ|
1145:61: bidyate hi na sa kaścidupāyaḥ sarvalokaparitoṣakaro yaḥ ||28||
1145:63: satyāsatye ca maitridveṣau kuryāt svaparaiḥ saha ||29||
1145:64: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvamapi ghnataḥ |
1145:65: krodhameva tu yo hanti tena sarve dviṣo hatāḥ ||30||
1145:69: prajñā hrāso na yāvadhdi tāvatkuryāt svayaṃ hitam ||32||
1145:70: vyabhicāreṣvāsattaḥ rājā tasya hi nirakṣaro mantri |
1145:71: tadā dhanāśā kutra rakṣyā asavaḥ prayatnena ||33||
1145:75: kākaścālayet pākaṃ vastūnāṃ tatra kā kathā ||35||
1145:77: puṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ vicinvīta mūlocchedaṃ na kārayet ||36||
1145:78: valmīkaṃ madhujātaṃ ca śuklapakṣe ca candramāḥ |
1145:80: hīnatā yācane yatra syāttatra na ca yācyatām |
1145:81: kāmaṃ hi na bhavedindro himājjīvati tittariḥ ||38||
1145:82: mayūra ! grīṣmasya tu tāpayukta āśāyutaḥ khasya jale bhavestvam |
1145:83: kaṇṭhantu no nāmaya gauraveṇa nīre taḍāgasya tu dūṣitasya ||39||
1145:88: sarpāḥ pibanti pavanaṃ na ca durbalāste
1145:92: sa śobhate puṣpitapuṣpavacca sumaṇḍitaṃ yasya mukhaṃ suvarṇaiḥ |
1145:93: anakṣaraṃ yasya mukhaṃ bhavecvet tannetravaktre bhubi chidravacca ||42||
1145:94: muktāmaṇibhyāṃ ca hi gardabhasya kiṃ śūkarasya priyabhojanena |
1145:95: andhasyadīptyā badhirasya gītaimūrkhasya dharmeṇa kimasti kṛtyam ||43||
1145:100: kṣatiṃ bihāya yenāpi prayogeṇa hitasya kim |
1145:104: kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ |
1145:105: rogāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā mārgāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na vīryam ||48||
1145:106: dhanalipsuḥ suhrit tyājyā bhāryā ca vyabhicāriṇī |
1145:107: adharmī ca nṛpaḥ krūro mantrī piśuna eva ca ||49||
1145:108: kupradeśo hi durvyavasāyo duṣṭo'tha vai suhṛt|
1145:109: baidyo'dakṣo'pi duḥsevyam vastu heyā ime'pi ca ||50||
1145:115: aho ! susadṛśī ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca ||53||
1145:116: yathā bāryo na laśunasya gandhaḥ kastūrikācandanacandrasaṃjñaiḥ |
1145:117: tathā na vāryā varaśāstraśikṣā'bhyāsena duṣṭasya ca duṣṭatā'pi ||54||
1145:119: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ ||55||
1145:121: nyūne śaradi nīre hi nadīṃ sarve taranti ca ||56||
1145:124: duṣṭā narā bhṛtyagaṇo'vamānī praśikṣitā naiva hayāḥ kubhāryā |
1145:125: pratāḍanenaiva bhavanti namrāḥ sukarmayogyā na kadāpi caite ||58||
1145:126: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam |
1145:127: vṛthā dānaṃ samarthasya vṛthā hīnasya satkṛtiḥ ||59||
1145:128: padmāni satputramukhe lasanti rohanti nūnaṃ kulaṭāsutasya |
1145:129: viṣasya patrāṇi yathā karoti duṣkarma yo vai labhate phalantat ||60||
1145:130: abhracchāyā khale prītiḥ sidhdamannaṃ ca yoṣitaḥ
1145:132: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛdhdā madyaṃ ca taruṇaṃ dadhi |
1145:133: nakte bhojo divā svāpaḥ ṣaḍete prāṇahāriṇaḥ ||62||
1145:136: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamāno ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kunarasya sevā |
1145:138: karmī hyalābhī balino'pakartā darpī ca bhikṣurhyadhanaḥ sukhārthī |
1145:146: yācakaḥ svādubhoji ca darpī bhikṣāparo bhavet |
1145:148: sakṛjjalpanti rājānaḥ āryo hi dṛśyate sakṛt |
1145:161: na dṛśyate tena gṛhe tu patnyāḥ kāmādimithyācaraṇaṃ kukṛtam ||76||
1145:163: pāre gatasya kiṃ nāvā kāntayā kiṃ virāgiṇaḥ ||77||
1145:165: gūḍhe vacasi bhojye'sti prīti pṛthagjanasya ca ||78||
1145:166: śaile śaile na māṇikyaṃ mīne mīne na mauktim |
1145:167: sādhavo he na sarvatra candanaṃ na vane vane ||79||
1145:175: vinītāya ca śāntāya janāya kā sahiṣṇutā ||82||
1145:181: aṅkamāruhya suptasya hantuḥ kiṃ nāma pauruṣam ||85||
1145:182: kaumāre pitarau pātaḥ bhartrī rakṣati yauvane |
1145:184: āsaktirna bhaveddyāvat tāvattu guṇa eva saḥ |
1145:189: bālaḥ payasā dagdho dadhyapi fūtkṛtya bhakṣayati ||89||
1145:196: śiṣṭā na gṛhṇanti purā pratijñāṃ gṛhṇanti cet te kaṭhinapratijñām |
1145:197: aṅgikṛtāṃ tāṃ paripālayanti pāṣāṇarekhāmiva te tadānīm||93||
1145:198: prāpnoti vittaṃ hyadhamo ti kiñcid garvī pareṣāmavamānanāyām |
1145:199: saṃjāyate labdhadhanaḥ sumartyaḥ supakvadhānyena samaṃ vinamraḥ ||94||
1145:204: guṇā guṇajñeṣu guṇā bhavanti te nirguṇaṃ prāpya bhavanti doṣāḥ |
1145:205: susvādu toyāḥ prabhavanti nadyaḥ samudramāsādya bhavantyapeyāḥ ||97||
1145:208: alpā dṛḍhā ye mṛdubhāṣiṇaśca tebhyo'vadhānaṃ karaṇīyameva |
1145:209: niryāti sūryaḥ saghanādhdi meghāt syāt tatprakāśastu tadā'titīkṣṇaḥ ||99||
1145:210: śāntipriyāḥ syuḥ khalu yauvane'pi vaiduṣya evaṃ vinatā bhaveyuḥ |
1145:215: upekṣate tatra sukhaṃ na ceha janaḥ prapātastha ivāsti cāndhaḥ ||102||
1145:216: ye kleśarogiṇo bhuktvā na ca saddharmabheṣajam |
1145:217: pramattā viṣayāsaktā bhavābdhiṃ na taranti te ||103||
1145:221: śvastanaṃ cādya kuryācca pūrva madhyāhnikaṃ varam ||105||
1145:225: sato jīvanamanto vā varaṃ tvākheṭakasya na ||107||
1145:227: gātheyaṃ bhāratīyopādhyāyavinayacandreṇa bhoṭadeśīya lokacakṣu bhikṣuṇā dharmaprajñenānūditā nirṇītāceti |
